Text: A little of Bill goes a long way,but with this amount proceed with caution.Death by laughter is a serious matter. Thanks for this seriously.

An interesting note... I have the Audio Tape version of RELENTLESS, which I bought back in 1991. I also picked up the CD a few years ago, but it ISN'T the same recording as the original tape. It's obviously a near-identical show from the period, but it is not the tape version. It's a shame, because both the audience and his performance was better on the tape.
